item.description: SWEA 문제풀이 공통조상 def sol(n): q = [n] cnt =0 while q: cnt += 1 a = q.pop() for i in v_1[a]: q.append(i) return cnt for t in range(int(input())): v, e, n1, n2 = map(int, input().split()) n3 = 9**9 v_1 = [[]for _ in range(v+1)] v_2 = [[]for _ in range(v+1)] data = [*map(int, input().split())] for i in range(e): v_1[data[2*i]].append(data[2*i+1]) v_2[data[2*i+1]].append(data[2*i]) while n1 != n3: n1 = v_2[n1][0] n3 = n2 while n3>1 and n1 !
